oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various interviews - Biff Collie - 1965-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of interviews with Kenny Roberts (performer), Freddie Hart (performer), Bill Carlisle (performer), Johnny Dollar (performer), Tex Ritter (performer), Wilf Carter (performer), Carl and Pearl Butler (performers), Tommy Collins (performer), Johnny and Jonie Mosby (performers), Ernie Ashworth (performer), and Jimmy Martin (performer), as conducted by Biff Collie in October of 1965.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Biff Collie describes the scene at the Andrew Jackson hotel, and introduces Kenny Roberts -- (00:51) Kenny Roberts talks about being called the yodeling jumping cowboy -- (01:24) Roberts talks about where he lives now, and touring, and thanks Biff and does a brief yodel break -- (02:03) Biff talks about being in the Andrew Jackson hotel, and introduces Freddie Hart -- (02:54) Freddie Hart talks about giving away copies of Hank William's guitar at the convention -- (03:22) Hart talks about the story of Hank Williams's guitar, and concludes the interview -- (04:30) Bill Carlisle jokes with Biff and talks about a recent record of his -- (05:15) Biff talks about Kitty Carlisle -- (05:45) Biff describes the room and introduces Johnny Dollar -- (06:05) Dollar talks about how great the convention is, and gives his PO box -- (07:12) Biff introduces Tex Ritter -- (07:27) Ritter congratulates Biff on being on the CMA board, and talks about being the president of the CMA -- (08:26) Biff talks about this being the week of the year in country music, and introduces Wilf Carter -- (08:48) Carter talks about how great the convention is, and thanks Biff for his kind words -- (09:11) Carter talks about living in Orlando, Florida, and recording more records -- (09:55) Carl and Pearl Butler introduces themselves to Biff -- (10:55) Pearl talks about singing with Carl and cutting a record -- (12:15) Tommy Collins talks about being from Oklahoma, recent record releases, and collaborations -- (13:26) Biff sets the scene, and introduces Johnny and Jonie Mosby -- (14:15) Johnny talks about this week being the highlight of the year, and how you can accomplish a lot during the convention, and thank Biff -- (15:23) Biff introduces Ernest Ashworth -- (15:37) Ashworth talks about preferring sad songs, and his favorite release, and thanks Biff and all his listeners -- (17:32) Biff introduces Jimmy Martin -- Martin talks about playing Crapgrass music (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Collie, Biff; Roberts, Kenny; Hart, Freddie; Carlisle, Bill; Dollar, Johnny; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Carter, Wilf, 1904-1996; Butler, Carl; Butler, Pearl; Collins, Tommy; Mosby, Johnny; Mosby, Jonie; Ashworth, Ernie; Martin, Jimmy;
